mapper.select: SELECT s.ID, s.HOSPITAL_ID, h. NAME AS HOSPITAL_NAME, p. NAME AS PLATFORM_NAME, p. CODE AS PLATFORM_CODE, h. CODE AS HOSPITAL_CODE, t. NAME AS TRADE_NAME, t. CODE AS TRADE_MODE, s.APP_ID, t.CATEGORY, h.AREA_CODE, h.AREA_NAME FROM BIZ_HOSPITAL h LEFT JOIN BIZ_HOSPITAL_PLATFORM_TRADE_SETTINGS s ON h.ID = s.HOSPITAL_ID LEFT JOIN SYS_PLATFORM p ON p.ID = s.PLATFORM_ID LEFT JOIN SYS_TRADE_MODE t ON s.TRADE_MODE_ID = t.ID WHERE s.HOSPITAL_ID = ( SELECT HOSPITAL_ID FROM BIZ_HOSPITAL_PLATFORM_TRADE_SETTINGS WHERE APP_ID = #{appId} ) ORDER BY PLATFORM_CODE, TRADE_MODE

SELECT b.CODE AS BRANCH_CODE, b.NAME AS BRANCH_NAME, s.HOSPITAL_ID, h. NAME AS HOSPITAL_NAME, p. NAME AS PLATFORM_NAME, p. CODE AS PLATFORM_CODE, h. CODE AS HOSPITAL_CODE, t. NAME AS TRADE_NAME, t. CODE AS TRADE_MODE, h.AREA_NAME, h.AREA_CODE FROM BIZ_BRANCH b LEFT JOIN BIZ_HOSPITAL h ON b.HOSPITAL_ID = h.ID LEFT JOIN BIZ_HOSPITAL_PLATFORM_TRADE_SETTINGS s ON h.ID = s.HOSPITAL_ID LEFT JOIN SYS_PLATFORM p ON p.ID = s.PLATFORM_ID LEFT JOIN SYS_TRADE_MODE t ON s.TRADE_MODE_ID = t.ID ORDER BY PLATFORM_CODE, TRADE_MODE

SELECT s.HOSPITAL_ID, h. NAME AS HOSPITAL_NAME, p. NAME AS PLATFORM_NAME, p. CODE AS PLATFORM_CODE, h. CODE AS HOSPITAL_CODE, t. NAME AS TRADE_NAME, t. CODE AS TRADE_MODE, h.AREA_NAME, h.AREA_CODE FROM BIZ_HOSPITAL h LEFT JOIN BIZ_HOSPITAL_PLATFORM_TRADE_SETTINGS s ON h.ID = s.HOSPITAL_ID LEFT JOIN SYS_PLATFORM p ON p.ID = s.PLATFORM_ID LEFT JOIN SYS_TRADE_MODE t ON s.TRADE_MODE_ID = t.ID WHERE p.CODE in (1, 2) GROUP BY h.NAME
